channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Storage Protect for Virtual Environments: Data Protection for VMware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Storage Protect for Virtual Environments: Data Protection for VMware

item.title: CVE-2024-38329|2024-06-25T15:00:40.355Z -- ibm -- storage%20protect%20for%20virtual%20environments%3A%20data%20protection%20for%20vmware
item.description: IBM Storage Protect for Virtual Environments: Data Protection for VMware 8.1.0.0 through 8.1.22.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of user permission. By sending a specially crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to change its settings, trigger backups, restore backups, and also delete all previous backups via log rotation. IBM X-Force ID: 294994.

item.title: CVE-2024-38329|2024-06-19T13:43:49.633Z -- ibm -- storage%20protect%20for%20virtual%20environments%3A%20data%20protection%20for%20vmware
item.description: IBM Storage Protect for Virtual Environments: Data Protection for VMware 8.1.0.0 through 8.1.22.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of user permission. By sending a specially crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to change its settings, trigger backups, restore backups, and also delete all previous backups via log rotation. IBM X-Force ID: 294994.
